function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Deployment of anti-contagion policies in response to high total numbers of cases","Impact":"Increases risk of policy deployment being reactive rather than proactive","Mitigation":"Implement proactive surveillance systems and early warning mechanisms","Technologies":"Surveillance technology, predictive modeling, early warning systems","People":"Decision-makers, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, government"}]}
